idea-plugin.name: EmojiPrefix
idea-plugin.description:
Do you like Emoji Prefix Commit? (ex. :bug: Fix!)
This plugin makes it easy.

How to use?
create ".emojirc" and write a file.
(ex.
bug=Code Fix
rocket=Performance upgrade
)
